name: Workout of the Day
author: WorkoutBOX Workouts

sections.description:
This widget will add a new workout to your blog each day. All workout routines are created by the personal training team at WorkoutBOX.

WorkoutBOX Features professionally designed muscle building workouts and fat burning workouts with step-by-step video instructions, combined with personalized support from in-house fitness team.

Download Now!
sections.installation:
1. You can either use the automatic plugin installer or your FTP program to upload it to your wp-content/plugins directory the top-level folder. Don’t just upload all the php files and put them in /wp-content/plugins/.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add the Workout of the Day widget to your sidebar through the ‘Appearance => Widgets’ menu in WordPress.
  4. That’s it!
